title: Adivina el Personaje Bíblico
description:
La mejor trivia de personajes bíblicos

Adivina el Personaje Bíblico es un divertido juego de preguntas y respuestas basado en los personajes más carismáticos, recordados y queridos en las relatos narrados en la biblia📘.

Este juego contiene más de 40 niveles de pura diversión en los cuales deberás reconocer el nombre de personajes bíblicos muy famosos como:
⭐David
⭐Jesus
⭐Sanson
⭐Moises
⭐Jose
⭐Pedro
⭐Cain y Abel
⭐Maria
¡Y Muchos otros personajes diferentes de varios pasajes de la biblia que de seguro reconoces!

Adivina el Personaje Bíblico es sin duda un gran juego para todos los fanáticos apasionados creyentes y devotos a la biblia⛪.

Características del quiz bíblico
✅Consume muy poco espacio de memoria.
✅Es gratis.
✅Tiene un diseño amigable y religioso.
✅Pide ayuda a tus hermanos o amigos en los niveles difíciles fácilmente.

¿En qué consiste el juego?
El juego consiste simplemente en adivinar por medio de una imagen el nombre de los personajes bíblicos que se muestran en una imagen en cada nivel. Estas imágenes contienen una imagen característica del personaje bíblico o alguna escena característica narrada en la biblia en la que están relacionados los personajes👏. 

A través de esta tendrás que adivinar correctamente el nombre del Personaje Bíblico.

¿Cómo Jugar?
Para jugar tan solo tendrás que presionar los botones que aparecen en cada nivel debajo de la imagen que contienen letras ordenadas aleatoriamente. Por medio de estas tendrás que formar correctamente el nombre del personaje bíblico mostrado para superar el nivel y poder jugar los siguientes.

Pasa horas de completa diversión con este divertido juego que te recordará a todos esos personajes tan conocidos de la biblia✨

title: QuizIt - General Knowledge Trivia Quiz
description:
Welcome to the world of mind games, get ready to check your intelligence level completely free of cost. In this 2018 new game, there are more than 20,000 questions of different categories such as sport, history, celebrity, movies, music, geography and much more related to general knowledge? The quiz has up to 4 lifelines, you can answer as many questions as you want until your all 4 life does not end plus you can add one more life to enjoy playing more.   

This mind game also gives the facility of option half, in this option the two wrong answers are removed from the options. If you don’t want to answer any question than simply skip that question and go on to a new question. If you find some difficulty to sort out the question and you want some more time than additional thinking time option is also given in this brain game.  
Quizlt! The intellectual game is a challenge for all age group to test their knowledge. More correct answers will rank you higher and you get a good reward, so solve out the quiz and saw your position on the leaderboard. Upgrade feature is also available, in refill option you can increase your helper amount, add +2 to help and continue `testing your level of education.

”An investment in knowledge pays the best interest” so don’t waste your time, install this free mind game and have fun and knowledge both together.

title: Guess Shakers Game - Trivia Game
description:
Shakers Game Quiz is a game created for fans of the Nick series who want to demonstrate everything they know about Game Shakers.

The game consists of 40 levels with modified images of the Game Shakers characters. You must guess the names, if you get the right coins, if you do not know the name of a character you can share the image with your friends or use the coins for hints.

Only the best fans of the series manage to surpass all the levels.


CHARACTERISTICS:

- 25 levels
- The names of the characters are in English


DISCLAIMER

This is UNOFFICIAL game of Game Shakers inspired by the TV series, created by fans for fans of the series.

title: Quiz: Agatha Christie's Miss Marple
description:
Have you read all the works written by the great Queen of detective fiction? Do you know all about the weaknesses of the nice old lady from St. Mary Mead? Do you remember every crime solved with the help of phenomenal observation and life experience of that granny with pink knitting in her hands?

Test your knowledge, strain your memory and remember your favorite novels and stories, where the characters of Agatha Christie is acting: Miss Marple, her nephew Raymond West, inspector Slack, sir Henry Clithering and others.

Try to play our quiz: answer the questions based on the books, earn coins for the correct answers, use the hints and unlock new achievements!

Information about the game:
- More than 110 questions about Miss Marple based on Agatha Christie's works.
- Questions of varying difficulty: some are easy to answer, while others can make you reread some books.
- Different types of tasks: you need to choose correct answers, enter the answer yourself or make connections between facts. 
- If a question will cause you some difficulty you can skip it and come back to it later.
- For correct answers you will get coins which you can spend on hints.
- For the game achievements you will get points in your Google play account.
- AppEase game is free and has quite a bit advertising.
- Don't forget to play our quiz dedicated to Belgian detective Hercule Poirot!

title: Guess the president - find American presidents
description:
Guess the president - find out all the American presidents.
America, this is a very powerful and world-famous country in our hemisphere. Many people say that it is ruled by aliens, and some people say that this is a country of democracy and strong people. Who pierced their way to glory through obstacles and joy.
On this continent there were few wars, you can say they did not exist at all. There was a civil war, well, somehow the Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor. But the US troops showed which country is stronger and higher. In our time all countries are considered with this country. And even Russia listens to it.
Our application is not about politics, but about knowledge, those people who teach geography and history. After all, to know your history and the history of other countries, this is very necessary and significant in our time. In this democratic country, the strength of the president is strongest. After all, it is the president who directs all his strength and will to improve the welfare of the people of America.
The United States of America has appeared not so long ago. Before, the Indians lived there. Very clever and religious people. But then history put everything in its place and indicated the path of every civilization. The US has more presidents, as many as 45 people. We will ask about them.
In general, it was in America that such a science was born as marketing, and it is enjoyed by the whole world. Even the English came to a world name thanks to America. And of course thanks to the presidents.
So the presidents made a Thanksgiving holiday. What suggests that in this country the leaders of all the gusts should know by sight. They were the first to have an African-American president. This is a country - this is democracy, these are the American presidents.
Notable Presidents:
George Washington
John Adams
Thomas Jefferson
James Madison
James Monroe
John Quincy Adams
Andrew Jackson
Martin Van Buren
William Henry Harrison
John Tyler

title: Survive discussion
description:
In this application you will have to find the best answer in uncomfortable debates with a radical character. Be cautious, and choose the best option, or you will lose all your lives.

If your answers are very offensive, you can also lose the game.

Understand that this application contains inappropriate language and politically incorrect answers, if you are a sensitive person who may feel offended when talking about certain topics, for example:  feminazi, etc ... we recommend not using this app.

This application is NOT intended to promote hatred towards individuals or groups based on race or ethnic origin, religion, disability, sex, age, nationality, military veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or other characteristics associated with discrimination or the systemic marginalization.

title: Guess the Mercenaries tank from WOT
description:
Guess the Mercenaries tank from WOT

One of the best games in its genre about Tanks and armored vehicles!
For real connoisseurs and connoisseurs of tanks and armored vehicles!
For all fans of puzzles, puzzles, crosswords and quizzes!
100% Pleasure!
The rules are as simple as possible: From the picture you need to guess the name of the model of the tank. Look at the pictures - draw an analogy and guess the model of the tank. title: 囧囧大衝關
description:
今天的我你愛搭不理，明天的我你高攀不起！《囧囧大衝關》讓你體驗走上人生巔峰的快感！
如何才能打敗所有人，站在人群之巔？這需要你智商與手速並存，套路與智慧合作。深入淺出的題目，讓你在娛樂之際，挖掘大腦潜力，是貧窮限制了你的想像力？不，你缺少的就是像《囧囧大衝關》這樣與眾不同的遊戲！即使稍有不慎答題失敗，花式死亡死法，讓你感受到別樣的樂趣。放弃吧，論死法，你是比不過我的。
趕快動動手指和大腦，感受這場前所未有的挑戰，請開始你的表演！

遊戲特點：
-海量題庫，只有你想不到，沒有我們做不到。
-別樣的答題競技遊戲，打開你新世界的大門。
-簡單趣味的操作模式讓你欲罷不能。
-何時何地，隨手暢玩，心有多大舞臺就有多大。
-角色多樣，即使萌也要萌的有個性。

title: Disciple Creed
description:
You have to solve the mysteries of Jesus' Disciples to earn keys that unlock the temple of creedor gates.
 
Here's how: 

A riddle about Jesus' Disciples will appear, with 60 seconds to solve each riddle. If at any time you think you have solved a riddle, simply press that Disciple's name. A bible icon on the side of game screen, when pressed, can help you gather secrets to solve riddles when confronted with difficult stages. The more riddles you solve, the more the game will reward you with hidden secrets, virtual currency, free prizes, and discounted gifts.

TRUE OR FALSE, TRIVIA, QUIZES & MATCHING OF DISCIPLES PICTURES: 

On True or False, Trivia and Quiz stages, questions about Jesus and his Disciples are presented and will require you to answer correctly by pressing the correct answer, earning you keys on these stages. On matching Disciples picture stages, you simply place Disciples pictures in their correct picture frames. 60 seconds is also given on these stages to answer questions and match Disciples pictures. Again, use the bible icon to find hidden secrets to help answer questions, and to get a glimpse of Disciple's pictures. The more stages you win, the more rewards you will earn, and the more keys you will acquire to unlock temple gates- Declaring you a Disciple of Christ!

title: MyRiddles - Brain word game of riddles
description:
Imagine being able to solve the most complex puzzles and riddles while you exercise your mind, and all this while having fun. We've created this game to keep your little moments of entertainment always at hand. Are you ready for the challenge?

Solve puzzles with our MyRiddles game brain, you'll never know boredom. The best thing about our riddles or tongue twisters, is that they are suitable for both children and adults so it is a great source of learning, which will help us to exercise our mind and all this while having fun.

We have a great compilation with thousands of adictive riddles that we propose you to guess. In addition we will update daily with new challenges, puzzles and riddles.

It may seem silly but psychologists around the world agree that the riddles are extremely positive for the learning of anyone regardless of age. 

This game is very positive for adults as it will help you develop mentally. Solving complex problems is very beneficial for many areas of everyday life.

Playing MyRiddles for a while every day will help you keep a mind alive and full of ideas.

The mind is fundamental to our life. Maintaining a good mental state is even more important than keeping fit. Throughout our lives we tend to lose faculties and any activity that helps us to enhance our ability and MyRiddles is great to achieve it.

We will be able to solve simple problems to measure our brain's reaction. The puzzles and challenges you have in this game will help you achieve your goal.

Thanks to this entertaining game of logic with challenges, riddles and riddles, you will notice after a while the results achieved. Results that will translate into symptoms such as good mood, positivity or the desire to learn new things every day.

We will also be able to solve difficult puzzles that will help us to develop our capacity of resolution and approach of our brain. You will be able to improve your IQ and you will notice that you will approach your daily problems in a different way.

In MyRiddles you will play with Rubies, the more rubies you have, the easier it will be to overcome levels but don't worry because if you run out of them you will be able to get more for free.

Main characteristics:
❤️ Totally Free
❤️ Great collection of riddles and riddles.
❤️ Enjoy a great challenge every day.
❤️ It never ends, because we are adding new levels with more riddles and riddles.
❤️ You can get more rubies for free.
❤️ Challenge your friends and family with levels you've already surpassed.

title: Adivina el Shore
description:
Completa todos los niveles adivinando el nombre de tus Shore favoritos

Adivina el Shore es un muy divertido juego en el cual tendrás que adivinar el nombre de los actores miembros y personajes de todas las diferentes series de Shore😱.

En este juego encontrarás a los personajes más borrachos, locos y divertidos de todas las series y temporadas de esta serie. Entre los personajes que encontrarás están:
⭐Potro
⭐Mane
⭐Karime
⭐Fer
⭐Danik
⭐Esteban
⭐Abraham
⭐Gaz
⭐Scotty
⭐Holly
⭐Charlotte
⭐Kyle
⭐Marty
⭐Brenda
⭐Thalia
¡Y muchos otros más!

Este juego cuenta con más de 40 niveles de diversión absoluta que requerirán todos tus conocimientos para superar cada nivel.

Características del juego
✅Diseño único y orientado a la temática.
✅Es gratis.
✅Contiene a todos los personajes de Shore’s que han salido al aire.

title: Adivina la película
description:
Pasa gratos momentos recordando las películas más vistas del mundo
Adivina la película es un entretenido juego en el que tendrás que adivinar el nombre de todas las películas más históricas y populares que han existido a lo largo del tiempo y que han causado gran controversia en todo el mundo🎬.

Este fascinante juego cuenta con más de 40 niveles y diferentes extras además de bonus y recompensas. El juego contiene películas de diferentes géneros tales como:
✨Películas de acción
✨Peliculas de Comedia
✨Películas de Superhéroes
✨Películas de Terror
✨Películas de Drama
✨Películas de Romance
✨Películas de Ciencia Ficción
✨Películas de Suspenso
✨Películas de Dibujos animados.

Características del Juego
✅Contiene películas de diferentes generos y epocas.
✅Posee más de 40 niveles distintos.
✅Es gratis.
✅Funciona sin conexión a internet.
✅Contiene funcionalidades adicionales para recibir ayuda fácilmente.

¿En qué consiste el juego?
El funcionamiento del juego es muy sencillo en cada nivel aparecerá una imagen con un representación o un símbolo significativo de la película, usando esta se tiene que reconocer y adivinar adecuadamente el nombre de la película para poder superar el nivel satisfactoriamente.

¿Cómo jugar?
Para jugar tendrás que formar satisfactoriamente el nombre de la película utilizando los diferentes botones con letras que aparecen debajo de las imágenes en cada nivel.

Completa este juego de películas, demostrando todos tus conocimientos y acabando en su totalidad esta gran trivia de películas💫

title: Geo Challenge en Español
description:
Geo challenge en español es un divertido juego de geografía, el cual pone a prueba tus conocimientos de geografía del mundo, con gráficos animados y divertidos pasaras emocionantes momentos.
El juego cuenta con 4 desafíos para comprobar tus conocimientos de geografía: Banderas, Paises, Destinos y Ciudades. Reconoces las principales ciudades del mundo, los monumentos históricos mas importantes del mundo? 

2 Modalidades de juego

Desafio completo: Completa las 170 preguntas, pero solo tienes 3 vidas, si las pierdes termina el juego.

Contra Reloj: Tienes 50 segundos para tratar de responder correctamente la mayor cantidad de preguntas. 

Un gran juego de preguntas para incrementar tus conocimientos de geografía del mundo, si eres estudiante, viajero o amante de la geografía seguro disfrutaras del juego. 

Utilice este divertido juego de geografía para aumentar sus conocimientos y batir sus propios récords, puede iniciar sesión con gmail o facebook si desea participar del desafío de líderes, el cual registra a los 100 mejores participantes.

Características generales del juego de Geografía:

- 170 Banderas del mundo
- 170 Paises
- 30 Territorios (mas próximamente)
- Los Destinos mas importantes del mundo
- Las ciudades mas importantes
- 3 vidas en el desafío total
- 50 Segundos en el desafío contrarreloj
- Tabla de Líderes mundiales
- Puntuaciones por categoria
- Y Muchas opciones divertidas mas...

Los puntos de referencia / atracciones imágenes fueron obtenidas de Internet para fines educativos y no se pretende infringir ningún derecho de autor. Si usted es dueño de los derechos de autor de las imágenes y desea que sean retiradas del juego, la amabilidad de ponerse en contacto con nosotros. Gracias.

title: That's Right
description:
We’re a real game changer. That’s Right is the first ever game show app that combines a dynamic, live quiz show with an exciting drawing at the end that anyone can win.

The idea sparked from two dreams we had as game players ourselves. We wanted to play a quiz game where the winners split a prize, but we also wanted every player to survive all the way to the end and have a chance to win even more. Who doesn’t love a chance to win cash, right?

So, we became the game we wanted to see in the world. We made it ourselves. That's right, just a couple of humble good ole boys from Louisiana's northeast have created their vision of the future of entertainment right in their own hometown. We figure, there's no more American way to show the big game shows how it's done than by building this in our backyards in between neighborhood crawfish boils!

In the first way to win, all players who answer every question right split a prize. Well deserved. They are the smartest in the room.

But who is the luckiest? That is decided in our second way to win: a whole new prize is awarded to one of the players by drawing a winning number from a ball machine. (And, yes, I know what you are thinking – the quiz winner could also be the winner of the raffle prize! Can you be the smartest AND luckiest one in the room? Try it!)

Each player receives a ticket just for entering the game. How fair is that!?! Then, as you get more right answers, you get more tickets. That’s Right! Players who get more questions right have a higher chance to win the raffle prize.

That’s not all though. All of this action and fun happens in the excitement of a live show with a live host. We know there are other live apps out there, but ours offers unique chances to win, all the way until the end.

What’s that? Somebody changed the game?
That’s Right. We sure did.

Now let’s play!

title: Soccer Expert
description:
"Soccer Expert" is a quiz game about Soccer. Here, You can measure your knowledge about soccer players, teams and learn more about soccer.

In "Player Names" game you will try to select the soccer players' names from their photos. Or choose the correct photo for the given name in the question.

In "Team and Logos" game you will try to find the correct soccer team's name from the logo.

In "Players and Teams" game you will try to name the team of the shown player.

In "Players and Countries" you try to find the country of the player shown. 

In "Stadium Names" you will try to match the correct stadium name with the soccer teams they belong to.

In all games there are 3 stages. In all stages you need to reach a specific score. When you finish the 3 stages, that game is completed. As you complete the games, new games will become available.

"Soccer Expert" aims to measure your knowledge about your football culture. Even if you select the wrong answer, test will still continue and you can keep guessing until you find the correct answer. But you will lose some points. 

As you play and try to increase your score you will expand your knowledge about the top soccer players' names, teams, nationalities as well as known football teams' names, countries.

"Soccer Expert" game contains questions in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Argentinian, Brazilian, Turkish, Australian, Croatian, Russian, Ukrainian, Norwegian, Greek and other football leagues and also national teams.

title: America North & South quiz – flags, capitals, maps
description:
We prepared a simple and fun quiz about all Americas countries. Can you guess USA flag and name its capital? Or can you find Cuba or Brazil and more than 30 other Americas countries on the borders map? Let’s find this out!

Test your knowledge
All countries of western hemisphere! Prove your geographical knowledges and guess them all.

Study Americas geography
Need a little help with upcoming exams and tests? We prepared helpful quiz with hundreds of questions about North, Central and South America and Caribbean archipelago countries.

Name all flag and capitals 
More than 30 Americas countries, flags and capitals to guess! Some capitals name is harder to remember then others, we have tried!

Borders maps
Guess country name by its borders map and prove that you mastered Americas geography. Caribbean archipelago islands countries are extra tricky to name!

Game levels
We prepared for you 6 different game levels: 5 of them to test yourself and one is for learning.
•	1 flag and 4 countries - Guess country name by flags. 
•	1 country and 4 flags - Guess flag by country name. 
•	Map and 4 countries - Guess country by its location on map
•	Flag, country and 4 capitals - Guess capital of the country
•	Capital and 4 countries - Guess the country by its capital
•	Country cards -  Learn the country flag and capital


This application “America: North, South – flags, capitals, maps quiz” is translated to 10 different languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spain, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Polish, Portuguese.

Enjoy it and spend your time learning something new!

This application made with Flutter - Google’s mobile app SDK and Material Design 2.

title: Riddle Me This!
description:
Riddle Me This! is a fun and addicting quiz game for any occasion, for all genders and for all ages. It contains hundreds of riddles (with more added regularly) to ensure plenty of fun!

The Riddle Me This! quiz features an easy, intermediate and hard game mode to ensure you can play for fun or challenges!
Pick your answer and see real time statistics from other users for each question answered! Earn yourself FREE gems to make use of hints, letter removal options and more!

An Internet connection is required to play this game for updated riddles, live statistics, promotions and more.

Features of this Riddle Me This! quiz app:
- Real time statistics
- Add your own riddles and we will add them if they are appropriate
- Hundreds of Riddle Me This! quiz questions
- Free to play
- Normal Riddle Me This! easy mode with no repeated questions
- Normal Riddle Me This! intermediate mode with no repeated questions
- Normal Riddle Me This! hard mode with no repeated questions
- Play it with friends and family or just on your own
- Endless Riddle Me This! easy mode
- Endless Riddle Me This! intermediate mode
- Endless Riddle Me This! hard mode
- Riddles are friendly for all ages and genders
- Updated with new riddles frequently
- Leave feedback to us directly in the app
- More games section where you can find other amazing games we have to offer!

All statistics are anonymous and all users are anonymous. The only thing that is saved is an extra one is added to the statistic of the Riddle Me This! app depending on how you answered the question.

If you submit your own question for the Riddle Me This! app, please consider adding context so that we can add your riddle for others to read and answer.

title: Quizzle
description:
Das fesselnde Quiz über lustige Onlineprodukte - Errate die Bewertungen im endless-runner!
Spiele mit aktuellen live-Daten und knacke deine Highscores!

Und so wird gespielt: 

Wähle nach dem Start den großen Play-Button.
Nun hast Du die Wahl: welches der eingeblendeten Produkte wurde vermutlich besser bewertet?
Entscheide dich durch einen Klick auf das jeweilige Bild. 
Du erhälst solange Punkte, bis Du einmal falsch tippst.

title: 두뇌운동 한글퀴즈
description:
하루에 몇 분만 투자하면 당신의 뇌가 건강해 집니다.
자투리 시간을 이용해 치매예방에 도움이 되는 다양한 게임을 즐겨보세요 ! 

- 한글단어를 영어나 한자로 표시하여 줌으로써 다양한 학습 기능 제공
  -> 영어설명 30,000단어, 한자 60,000단어,  한글 80,000여단어
- 나만의 단어장에 자신이 만든 단어 추가 기능 (1,000개 까지 추가 가능)
- 주어진 시간동안 끝말잇기를 하는 스피드 끝말잇기 기능 
- 노약자들을 위한 지속적인 두뇌훈련 유도로 치매 예방
- 다양한 미션을 통한 흥미 유발
- 사자성어 퀴즈를 통한 학습 기능 제공
가족과 재미로 끝말잇기를 하다보면 친밀감 상승과 함께 영어와 한자 실력도 쑥쑥!! 커질 것 입니다.

본 어플은 한국어 단어 실력 향상과 두뇌훈련을 목적으로 만들어진 어플입니다.
첫글자로 시작되는 단어가 거의 없는 끝장단어나 잘 사용하지않는 단어는 가능한 제외하였습니다.

건강한 몸을 위해 매일 운동을 하듯이 두뇌도 운동을 하는 게 정신건강에 좋다고 생각합니다.
생각하는 것이 뇌를 운동시키는 것이겠지요. 좀 더 생각할 때 우리 뇌는 건강해집니다
그래서 국내 유명 병원에서는 한글 맞추기 문제 등을 환자들에게 제공하기도 합니다.

두뇌운동 한글퀴즈와 함께 오늘도 즐거운 하루가 되시길 바랍니다.

title: Adivina el Dorama Coreano
description:
Prueba tus conocimientos recordando el nombre de los dramas que aparecen en este juego

Adivina el Dorama Coreano es un juego de preguntas y respuestas con el cual pasaras horas y horas de diversión recordando el nombre de esos Dramas que tantas risas o tristezas te han dejado😂.

Con adivina el Dorama tendrás que demostrar todas tus habilidades y tu verdadero fanatismo tratando de recordar los nombres de las series más populares (y algunas no tanto) emitidas durante estos últimos años😱.

Gracias a esta trivia de doramas recordarás todos los dramas que te dejaron atónito, sorprendido o totalmente triste.

Características del juego
✅Es gratis.
✅No requiere conexión a internet.
✅Posee más de 50 niveles distintos,
✅Funciones y opciones complementarias del juego incluidas.

¿En qué Consiste el Juego?
El trama de este juego es bastante simple, existen diferentes niveles en los cuales aparecerán las portadas o los personajes característicos de cada dorama junto a parte del nombre como pista y solo con eso tendrán que adivinar el nombre del dorama coreano.

Si aciertas el nombre pasarás al siguiente nivel, cada nivel va subiendo la dificultad un poco así que solo las verdaderas doramaniacas podrá superar este reto💪.

¿Cómo Jugar?
En la pantalla aparecerán una serie de letras que se debe ir presionando hasta formar el nombre del dorama correspondiente a la imagen. Si se acierta se avanza de nivel, si no tendrás que intentarlo hasta lograrlo.

¡Demuestrale a tus amigas quién es la verdadera Doramaniaca!⭐

title: Never have I ever: Drinking Game by Naked Truth
description:
"Never Have I Ever", also known as "I've Never…" or "Ten Fingers", is a drinking game to get to know your friends.

The rules are simple:

1. Read the statement out loud.
2.  Anyone who at some point in their lives has done the action, must drink.
3. If you've never done it, don't drink.

This classic verbal drinking game starts with the players getting into a circle. Then, the first player reads a statement from the app starting with "Never have I ever...". Anyone who at some point in their lives has done the action that the first player reads, must drink. Play then continues around the circle, and the next person reads a statement.


NAUGHTY, DIRTY & FUN QUESTIONS
Do you want to spice up your party? With "Never have I ever: Naked Truth", things just got a bit naughtier! It’s the must-have game for all kinds of parties, events or to get to know someone - if you're brave enough! With dirty topics, you can reveal all, in this uncensored, unrestricted drinking game!


THE CRAZIEST DRINKING & PARTY GAME IN THE PALM OF YOUR HAND
Skip "Spin the Bottle" and "Truth or Dare" - because "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" will lead your party to a brand-new level. This game is more than just "breaking the ice". Get as many people and friends around the game, gather some shot glasses and let the party begin. What have, and what haven’t you and your friends done? You will find it out.


SWIPE THROUGH TO GET NEW QUESTIONS
If you haven’t done it, your friends might have - and that’s the aim of the game in "Never have I ever: Naked Truth". Speak the truth about what you haven’t done and see which of your people cannot say the same about themselves. You will be surprised, who is the most daring! You might even discover some dirty secrets! 


DIRTY, SEXY AND UNRESTRICTED DRINKING GAME!
Gather all of your people and let "Never have I ever: Naked Truth" lead the way. Pass the phone around, and take a shot if you have done what they haven’t - it’s fun, naughty and entirely unrestricted! Play your way through those naughty categories.


Reveal the truth and spice things up in this addictive drinking game for Android!

Keep in mind; this game is exclusively for adults. If you're too young or easily offended, this game might not be for you.

And remember: Drink responsibly and don't drive afterwards!

title: Угадай персонажа мульта SpongeBob (Губка Боб)
description:
В игре ты должен угадать всех персонажей мультика Губка Боб Квадратные Штаны
Губка Боб — морская губка, хоть и выглядит, как кухонная. Характерные черты его внешности: большие голубые глаза, много дырочек по всему телу(около 20 дырок) и рот с выступающими вперед резцами, ямочками на щеках и веснушками. Он может по желанию изменять форму своего тела, а также длину и форму рук, втягивать их в себя. Обычно носит белую рубашку с коротким рукавом, красный галстук и коричневые квадратные штаны, отсюда и его фамилия «Квадратные Штаны» (хотя на самом деле штаны не квадратные, а прямоугольные). Его штаны подпоясаны чёрным ремнём. На ногах — чёрные ботинки, белые носки с синими и красными полосочками. Говорит высоким и тонким голосом. Очень любит петь вместе с Патриком.

title: Play The Bible Trivia Challenge
description:
Enjoy this unique new trivia game that does more than test your knowledge; it gives you the opportunity to learn as you play to keep the highest right-answer-accuracy possible!

You can play awhile every day for free, forever, but the more accurate you answer the questions, the longer you can play for free!

Challenge your way through trivia questions developed to start easy and get so difficult that even the most knowledgable Bible scholars will be challenged by the final level questions. 

Register and see your worldwide ranking with others playing! How well do you know your Bible? But perhaps the best question is, do you have what it takes to become the best by learning?

You can use the Bible to find your own answers, the Hourglass to extend the time to answer, the Bomb to clear 2 of the 4 answers and the Lightstrike to get it right when you give up!

Read the in-game Help instructions to learn about how to qualify an entry to win a $500 Visa Gift Card!

You can take on Play The Bible Trivia Challenge alone or register and see how you rank compared with friends to see who can achieve the highest level!

Play The Bible Trivia Challenge features:
•  Categories include Old Testament, New Testament, Anything Goes, Food & Wine and Signs & Wonders
•  Designed to start easy and become gradually more difficult as you progress through 500 Questions
•  Answer correctly and quickly to earn the most free gold bars
•  Stunning character graphics (a sneak peak at a future ‘character’ category)
•  Progress and Ranking shows you how you are progressing while, if Connected, will show your worldwide ranking and further questions necessary to advance
•  Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
•  Easily sync the game between devices (progress but not gold) and unlock full game features when playing while connected to the Internet
•  Great fun for Sunday school lessons and activities, too
•  A great evangelism tool! Become as knowledgable as a disciple, learning more every day
•  A fantastic Christian Bible game for those interested in becoming more Godly and closer to Christ

In the event you do not desire to allow anyone playing our game to acquire gold bars with real money, you can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Already a fan of Play The Bible games? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/PlayTheBible
twitter.com/playthebible

title: 4 Pics 1 Word: Trivia
description:
If you like guessing games and can't let go of your phone, this fun 4 Pics 1 Word Puzzle Plus Quiz is made for you. It's very likely that you've already played it and you're stuck on a level, whose images you can't assimilate to get it right. Try this Awesome Photo Game for you!

On Internet we can find a lot of tricks and traps to advance the level and it turns out to be a pretty addictive game. Four photos a word is a trivial game that you can get for free  in all versions of mobile, both for iOS and Android, and the more inches your screen has, the more details you can capture to guess.

There are many guessing games that Playstore has, but this one, without a doubt, has all the extras that make it the undisputed king of the Questions and Answers category. In addition, it adapts to all ages, so both children and adults can play it. Its rules are very simple. In each of its levels is shown a set of photos and you only have to guess the word that form the 4 images. As you increase the level, the degree of difficulty becomes greater.

The interesting thing is that this guessing game involves a quiz of photos that must relate to each other. The sound emitted by the game is very catchy , and its clues will help you advance in the game and not want to leave it. 

Although it's free, there is also the option to make some purchases, called micro transactions that allow you to get clues and advance faster level. This application has received excellent reviews by various digital media, achieving ratings that revolve around 4/5 stars. 

TRIVIAL CHARACTERISTICS

✅ Translated into 4 languages: Spanish, English, French and German.
✅ More than 120 levels available.
✅ Rewards system with coins to solve levels.
✅ Adapted to Tablets and Smartphones of any resolution.
✅ Lightweight size for downloading in countries with slow connections.
✅ Use tracks to download letters, add or even get direct feedback.


More about this Child's Trivia Game 

Encouraging curiosity and nourishing children's vocabulary can be done with these fun word games. Although technology has recently been besieged as an insulator of people, it must be stressed that the support it provides for teaching, learning and entertainment is unprecedented. 

Taking advantage of these applications for children to learn has made them more skilled, intelligent, able to learn different languages more quickly, as well as helping them in their process of learning to read, write, add and subtract.  

Tips to overcome levels and guess photos

The best trick is to read a lot, always the one who reads the most is the one who knows the most. But if it's about improving the game's strategy, here are a few:

● Do not use the hints unless it is extremely necessary.
● Do not be literal in reading the images, sometimes just a small detail will give you the answer.
● If you use the hints, the first one you should use is the discard letter. This will allow you to make the combinations with greater precision.
● Connect your game with social networks, having the help of your friends is always effective and also a lot of fun. 

In case of doubts, deletion of photographs or any other matter related to the App, you can contact us through the e-mail address provided below.

title: FAMILY FEUD THE MOBILE GAME
description:
On your mark! Let's play Family Feud The Mobile Game!
Play the fast-paced survey game based on the hit game show! See if you can guess the most popular answers to the survey questions. Get all the answers correct and move on to the next level. But be careful not to strike out!

The game is simple, 
Type in your answer to the question and tap the "ANSWER" Button. 
All you need to do is guess the popular answers to complete the level

If you submit a wrong answer, you'll get a strike. Get three strikes and the round is over! But no worries you can always restart the level. 

If you get stuck on the question, use your coins to reveal the answer you want. But remember, if you restart the level, you will never get back the coins you already used.

You'll win 20 coins if you complete a level.
Have a good time! and good luck!

title: THIS IS… Your World
description:
What do you know about your world? 
‘THIS IS… Your World’ is a new quiz game guaranteed to reveal surprising truths about the planet you live on.
Collect and compare over 200 cards from all corners of the Earth, including all 50 US States. 

If you can answer these, then try the harder challenges in the game!
What country is the biggest? Canada or Russia?
Who has the bigger economy? California or Italy? 
Which has the highest mountain? The United States or Australia?
Where is the homicide rate higher? Alaska or Mexico?
Who has the longer life expectancy? France or China?
Which has the largest population? Japan or the United Kingdom?

Win the game by correctly placing your cards into a list of countries. 
Play alone, play offline, play against friends. 
‘THIS IS… Your World’ is super educational. 

COMING SOON! Our other ‘THIS IS…’  card games are coming soon to test your knowledge on other subjects:
-	THIS IS… Military Machines: All about the planes, tanks and ships of warfare through the ages. 
-	THIS IS… Disease Lab: All about infectious disease! From the common cold to Ebola! 
-	THIS IS… Amazing Cities: All about the great cities of the world.

title: Guess the persons Mortal Kombats Trilogy
description:
Guess the persons Mortal Kombat Trilogy now or never!
Mortal Kombat Trilogy - a fighting game, published by Midway. This game is a compilation that includes the content of all previous games of the series based on the game mechanics Mortal Kombat 3 and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3. The game contains all the characters and almost all arenas from MK1, MK2, MK3, UMK3.
Each character that appeared in the games of the series before Mortal Kombat Trilogy is present in this game. In addition to the characters from Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3, Raiden and Baraka, as they appeared in Mortal Kombat 2, were added to the MKT. Both characters have one new special trick and new sprites of running and falling. A new version of Johnny Cage was played, played by a new actor. Cage has all the special moves from MK2, except for the blow to the groin, because the characters from MK3 / UMK3 did not have sprites with a reaction to this technique. The bosses of Motaro and Shao Kang became playable from the very beginning.
You will be able to show how you know the world of Mortal Kombat. For connoisseurs of games on the playstation is dedicated!

In this logo trivia game, you will come across every brand category that you know and love, including cars, fashion, apps, restaurants, movie industry, games industry, and many more. Guess the companies from all over the world, including the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and lots of others. We will bring back memories with several fun retro logos and older company symbols as well.

Earn coins for each correct answer and then use your coins to buy letters and hints.

Logos have become a part of our lives. We seem them on TV, on the street, on the subway, and in the shopping mall. How many logo brands are you subconsciously retaining? Now you’ll find out! Work with your friends to find the answers for the brands that you just can’t think of the name of.

With beautifully rendered logos and cool animations, Logo Quiz - Fun Quizzes is a pleasure to behold and fun to play. Logo Quiz is brought to you exclusively by Logo Games.

Features include:

- 1000 logos from all over the world.
- Daily free coins that can be used for letters and cool hints.
- Increasing difficulty as you play, with lots of logos that you'll be surprised you already know and recognize.
- Keeps track of your progress.
- Special bonus rewards.
- Beautiful and colorful use interface with great animations.
- All of the above absolutely free.

Enjoy the game!

title: This is Not a Game by Sam Bee
description:
Samantha Bee wants to get you excited about the 2018 midterm elections in the best way possible: a daily trivia game with a cash prize of up to $5,000! And don’t worry, the game isn’t rigged; it’s for everyone! We don’t care if you’re Republican, Democrat, Green Party, or Gary Johnson, we just want you to get excited about voting. 

Once per day, you’ll get the chance to answer 10 multiple choice questions about the midterms, current events and very important facts about democracy like in what 1980’s vampire movie Kiefer Sutherland played POTUS. Get every question right and you’ll win cash from the daily jackpot, split with the other winners (#winning)! Get every question wrong and you probably don’t know anything about the United States, so we’re glad you’re here. 

How it works: 
* Join the game every day when you get a push notification
* Answer 10 funny trivia questions while the clock counts down! 
* Win real cash by answering all 10 questions right.
* Winners split the daily jackpot of  $1K to $5K—and sometimes more! 
* Got a question wrong? Embarrassing—but you can keep playing to win if you have extra lives.
* No lives left? Now you're in Dead Mode. You won't be able to win today's prize, but answer correctly to earn lives for the next game.
* Get bonus lives by signing up for election reminders, inviting friends, and completing weekly challenges. If only a political comeback were that easy! 

Why did Sam Bee and Full Frontal make this game? To get people excited about the midterms, maybe even excited enough that they’ll go out and vote! America's typical midterm election turnout SUCKS and we are 100% certain this game will solve everything. We want America to learn facts, register to vote, and get involved in the U.S. election process. Isn’t that beautiful? Don’t answer. We know it is.

All civic-minded people are required by law to play the game for a chance to win a cash prize. Non-civic-minded people are also encouraged to play. See you in the game!

title: Taunt for Esports
description:
We’re incredibly excited to launch this first version of Taunt for League of Legends fans.  We will be adding tons of new features to the game in the coming months as well as supporting more games.  We’re always listening to player feedback on how we can make the game even more awesome in future versions.  Please join our Discord or use the feedback tools in the app to lets us know your thoughts!

------------

Taunt is the best way to watch esports: a game that challenges you and your friends to compete against each other (and the rest of the world) during live matches. Rally behind your favorite pro players and teams to prove that you know the game better than anyone else.

During a game, you’ll answer real-time curated challenges about events that just happened. You’ll also play cards to make predictions about the game, boost your points, or mess with fellow players. Make the right calls and you’ll soar to the top of the leaderboards. Miss too many, and your friends might rub that loss in your face.

Winning in Taunt is more than just a top score on the leaderboard during a match. You’ll be rewarded based on your performance, giving you new, fun ways to play the next time your favorite teams and players are facing off on the stage. Whether you’re fighting for first in the world, trying to beat your friends at your watch party, or just adding a twist to watching games at home, Taunt always makes watching esports a lot more fun.

Taunt currently supports League of Legends NA LCS and Worlds live games. Requires an internet connection.

title: Solo Feud
description:
Solo Feud is a free trivia guessing game app. This question game is designed off the popular TV game show, and is a fun and interesting way for guessing the most common answers for surveyed questions. Here we removed all of the other answers and give you ONLY ONE answer. The Number One answer among all! Can you guess them all? Available on both Android phone and tablet. 

★ Created for Fun Game Play
Solo Feud ask questions that were given to 100 people to vote and come up with the most popular answer. Solo Feud challenges player's to think of the number one (most common) answer for each question. There are 9 questions per round where you are rewarded coins and points to level up and continue forward. Play by yourself, or with a group of friends and family for hours of mind boggling fun!

★ Over 1000 Levels
Solo Feud has over 1000+ levels of complete trivia guessing fun! Challenge yourself and friends to see who can score the highest or even beat them all!

★ Highly Approved
Solo Feud is selected and approved as fun and challenging trivia game. A great time passer.

★ Simple Gameplay & Instant Fun
Start Solo Feud easily without any complicated rules or registration. Just install and start playing. Each level contains 1 question along with one answer. 

★ Help Feature
Your brain overheating? In Solo Feud, we offer several ways to help the player to get back on track such as show one correct letter, remove an incorrect letter, or reveal the right answer altogether!

Contact Us:
If you have any questions or comments, please send us email at danikashnetwork@gmail.com

title: TQ Trivia: Small Quiz Big Money
description:
TQ is the free-to-play daily trivia game with real cash prizes. At 9PM everyday, compete for big money by answering fun Nigerian and global trivia questions. 

Totally FREE to play. Win real cash. No strings attached. Small quiz, big money. 

*Note: TQ is only available on Android devices for now.*

How it works:
1. Download the FREE app.
2. At 9PM, join thousands of other players to answer fun trivia questions for FREE.
3. The player with the most correct consecutive answers at the end of the game wins the free CASH prize.
4. Watch out for surprise games at all hours of the day to win even more money.

• "Most fun and addictive game we've played this year" — The Overgraduate

• "University of Ibadan students have won over N100K already" — OGB

• "TQ may hold the secret to the future of gaming in Africa." — The Tech Confidant

title: Adivina el Personaje de Steven Universe
description:
Demuestra tus conocimientos en esta maravillosa trivia de Steven

Adivina el personaje de Steven Universe es un juego de preguntas y respuestas donde tendrás que demostrar todos tus conocimientos de esta serie 💫.

Este es un juego basado en la popular serie Steven Universe y todos sus fantásticos y enigmáticos personajes, pasa horas de diversión absoluta tratando de recordar el nombre de los personajes principales y secundarios en este divertido juego de Steven Universe.

El juego cuenta con más de 40 niveles y diferentes personajes entre los cuales hay algunos muy conocidos así como otros que no para aumentar la dificultad de este juego y hacerlo más divertido 😁.

Características de la aplicación
✅El quiz es gratuito y disponible para todos los países.
✅No requiere conexión a internet.
✅Posee más de 50 niveles distintos.
✅Pide ayuda a tus amigos en los niveles difíciles.

¿En qué consiste el juego?
Este es un juego tipo trivia en el cual simplemente tienes que adivinar correctamente el nombre del personaje de Steven Universe por medio de una imagen que aparece en cada nivel con la cual tendrás que superar el nivel exitosamente 👌.

Además a medida que superas los niveles recibirás premios y recompensas adicionales que puedes utilizar más adelante en niveles con mayor dificultad. En caso de que no puedas pasar algún nivel también puedes pedir ayuda a tus amigos enviándoles un mensaje directamente desde el juego para que te ayuden a completarlo.

¿Como Jugar?
En cada nivel solamente tendrás que formar el nombre correcto del personaje que se muestra en la imagen utilizando los botones que aparecen debajo de la imagen. Si lo realizas correctamente pasarás de nivel sino tendrás que seguir intentándolo 👻.

Pasa buenos momentos de entretenimiento con este divertido juego y pon a prueba todos tus conocimientos acerca de ¡Steven Universe!

title: Breaking Bad Quiz 👨‍🔬
description:
Are you a big fan of Breaking Bad?
Do you know all the characters?

Take this fun quiz, you have several reasons to do it:

▪️ + 40 levels
▪️ Main characters
▪️ Earn coins and buy advice.
▪️ Awesome design and game.
▪️ FREE!

Breaking Bad is an American neo-western crime drama television series.
The series tells the story of Walter White, a struggling and depressed high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with lung cancer. Together with his former student Jesse Pinkman, White turns to a life of crime by producing and selling crystallized methamp to secure his family's financial future before he dies, while navigating the dangers of the criminal world. The title comes from the Southern colloquialism "breaking bad", meaning to "raise hell" or turn toward crime.

Tags: tv show, bb, TV, Season, episodes,Albuquerque

title: Adivina el Personaje Bíblico
description:
Adivina el Personaje Biblico es un divertido juego de preguntas y respuestas basado en los personajes mas carismaticos, recordados y queridos en las relatos narrados en la biblia.

Este juego contiene mas de 40 niveles de pura diversion en los cuales deberas reconocer el nombre de personajes biblicos muy famosos como:
- David
- Jesus
- Sanson
- Moises
- Jose
- Pedro
- Cain y Abel
- Maria
¡Y Muchos otros personajes diferentes de varios pasajes de la biblia que de seguro reconoces!

Adivina el Personaje Biblico es sin duda un gran juego para todos los fanaticos apasionados creyentes y devotos a la biblia.

¿En que consiste el juego?
El juego consiste simplemente en adivinar por medio de una imagen el nombre de los personajes biblicos que se muestran en una imagen en cada nivel. Estas imagenes contienen una imagen caracteristica del personaje biblico o alguna escena caracteristica narrada en la biblia en la que estan relacionados los personajes.

A traves de esta tendras que adivinar correctamente el nombre del Personaje Biblico.

¿Como Jugar?
Para jugar tan solo tendras que presionar los botones que aparecen en cada nivel debajo de la imagen que contienen letras ordenadas aleatoriamente. Por medio de estas tendras que formar correctamente el nombre del personaje biblico mostrado para superar el nivel y poder jugar los siguientes.

Pasa horas de completa diversion con este divertido juego que te recordara a todos esos personajes tan conocidos de la biblia.

title: Friends Quiz  - Guess the Character
description:
Are you a big fan of the F.R.I.E.N.D.S TV Show?
Do you know all the characters?

Take this fun quiz, you have several reasons to do it:

▪️ + 50 levels
▪️ Main characters
▪️ Earn coins and buy advice.
▪️ Awesome design and game.
▪️ FREE!

Friends. Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

Rachel Green, Ross Geller, Monica Geller, Joey Tribbiani, Chandler Bing and Phoebe Buffay are six 20 something year-olds, living off of one another in the heart of New York City. Over the course of ten years, this average group of buddies goes through massive mayhem, family trouble, past and future romances, fights, laughs, tears and surprises as they learn what it really means to be a friend.

title: Adivina el Personaje de Pretty Little Liars
description:
Diviértete adivinando el nombre de los personajes principales de esta gran serie

Adivina el personaje de pretty Little liars es un divertido juego en el que tendrás que adivinar el nombre de tus personajes favoritos de la popular serie pretty Little liars. Si eres un fan de la serie seguramente podrás reconocer fácilmente a todos sus personajes principales, secundarios, incluso a algunos extras👍.

Este juego contiene a todos los personajes de esta popular serie que indudablemente te hará recordar de todos esos carismáticos queridos u odiados personajes que aparecen durante la serie📺. 

Características del juego
✅Contiene a todos los personajes principales y secundarios de la serie.
✅Tiene más de 50 niveles.
✅Es gratis.
✅Bonus y recompensas adicionales.
✅Pesa muy poco.

¿En qué consiste?
El juego consiste en adivinar correctamente el nombre del personaje que aparezca en la imagen de la serie pretty little liars, si lo haces adecuadamente serás recompensado con 5 monedas que posteriormente podrás usar en ayuda para niveles más difíciles, ayuda como borrar letras extra, revelar una letra o incluso resolver la pregunta, solo debes juntar suficientes monedas. Si no logras hacerlo correctamente se borrará tu respuesta y tendrás que iniciar de nuevo, si no puedes siempre puedes pedir ayuda a tus amigos lo importante en el juego es no rendirse, ánimo🏆.

¿Cómo se juega?
Para jugar debes apretar las letras que aparecen bajo cada imagen, debes hacerlo en orden para que se vaya formando la palabra que corresponde al nombre del personaje que se muestra en la imagen, si lo haces bien subirás al siguiente nivel, no es muy complicado.

Al completar el juego demostrarás que eres un verdadero fan de pretty Little liars, así que ánimo, completa todos los niveles🌠

title: Asia and Middle East countries - flags quiz
description:
Asia – land of the rising Sun and incredible miracles. We prepared this quiz app specially for those who wants to learn more about countries of Middle East or train their geographical knowledge.

There are 48 countries in Asia region and we gather them all in one fun and educational app. What is inside “Asia and Middle East countries - flags quiz”?
 
Countries flags and capitals
Flags of all asian and eastern countries and names of its capitals. You can guess country name or capital by its flag image and vice versa.
 
Borders map
Do you know where Singapore located? Try to guess country location by borders map. Try to name as much countries as you can!
 
For students
Learn more about Asia and Middle East geography and countries with our quiz. More than 300 questions to prepare yourself for the exams and tests.
 
Game Levels
We prepared for you 6 different game levels: 5 of them to test yourself and one is for learning.
- 1 flag and 4 countries - Guess country name by flags. 
- 1 country and 4 flags - Guess flag by country name. 
- Map and 4 countries - Guess country by its location on map
- Flag, country and 4 capitals - Guess capital of the country
- Capital and 4 countries - Guess the country by its capital
- Country cards - Learn the country flag and capital
 
“Asia and Middle East countries - flags quiz” app is translated to 10 different languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spain, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Polish, Portuguese.

This application made with Flutter - Google’s mobile app SDK and Material Design 2.

title: Anime In 10 Words
description:
The rule is simple: choose the answer that suits provided description the most! There're also 3 types of hints in case you got stuck at some point: "additional info", "50/50", "one mistake is ok".

★ "Anime" - We all watched tons of those, but do we still remember at least the plot?
★ "Manga" - Ow, you prefer reading over watching anime? Not a problem.
★ "Games" - O ho ho, no game - no life? Same here, my friend, same here.
★ "Western Anime" - And well ...there will be some western titles. I know most of you hate "RWBY", BUT I LIKE IT, so it will stay. Hmph.

I'm always glad to read any suggestions, please contact me on e-mail, it is somewhere at the page.

P.S All art, images and titles belong to their authors. If you want your property to be deleted from the game, contact me via e-mail.

title: Emoji Quiz - Guess The Emoji
description:
Emoji Quiz is the ultimate guessing game on Android! With over 1200 puzzles and growing. Emoji Quiz tests your guessing skills to solve Emoji puzzles! You will be shown a series of Emojis where you have to guess what the Emojis represent.

In this Emoji Quiz, Challenge your friends to see who can solve the most puzzles. Your game progress will be synced with Facebook and Google Plus, so you can play Guess The Emoji on all of your different devices.

Emoji Quiz Features:

★ A quiz having more than 1200 puzzles organized in over 45 levels.
★ Expert and Extreme levels to solve Emojis!
★ Hints are awarded to help you figure out the answer!
★ Helpful clues! Each Emoji puzzle rewards 2 hints! 
★ Available in 10 Languages.
★ The more emoji puzzles you unlock, the harder the puzzles will be to solve.
★ Swipe screen to switch between puzzles.
★ Earn 10 Hints Daily by answering the Daily Puzzle.
★ High quality graphics.
★ Scoreboard where you can compare your ranking with friends.
★ Log in with Facebook or Google Plus to sync your score and compete with your friends!
★ Ask your Facebook friends for help when stuck!
★ Frequent application updates!

Compare your answers with your friends! 
Challenge them to see who knows more Emoji puzzles!

title: Sherlock Quest - London Craft
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of Sherlock Quest - London Craft.

Sherlock Quest - London Craft - this quest is a game about the incredible adventures of the most famous detective of all times, Sherlock and his faithful friend Watson. You are waiting for riddles, puzzles and traps that you have to go through to get to a new level of the game. Move the walls and pictures to find a treasure hoard, follow the map, and bypass the mazes.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- The map of the mysterious London
- Investigation of crime
- Traps, puzzles and much more
- Quest quest

Both girls and boys will be happy to play this game. This is not only a game of craft and construction! Here you can enjoy adventure, and find a variety of items that will help you solve the problem.

title: Rulers of Great Britain - Test of History
descriptionHTML:
The app will help you learn the rulers of the UK and test your knowledge.

A list of the 57 most important and key rulers covers different historical periods of the history of the United Kingdom and the state-territorial entities that make up it: England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland.

Several game modes:
* Quiz - guess the word by letters;
* test with the answers;
* test on photos and portraits;
* educational cards;
* chronological table with a list of all rulers.

You can also click on the button, go to the page with information about the ruler in Wikipedia.

In the application, you will see such prominent representatives of the House of Wessex - Alfred the Great and Æthelstan Nice, House of Normandy - William I the Conqueror, House of Plantagenet - Richard the Lionheart, House of Lancaster - Henry V, House of York - Edward IV, House of Tudor - Elizabeth I, House of Stuart - Charles I and Anna House of Hanover - Queen Victoria, House of Saxe-Coburg-Gotha - Changed George V of Windsor, in connection with the First World War and many others.

The application has been translated into English and Russian.

*********************************************

description:
Do you think you know all the BTS members? Are you an ARMY?
Here is a new '5 SEC BTS QUIZ' trivia game featuring all seven members. You are presented with a question and five seconds. Your task is to select the correct answer.

Test your BTS knowledge and distinguish your favorite members with the others. 


Features:
★ 5 seconds to answer every question
★ All questions are randomly generated.
★ HIGH-QUALITY DESIGN
★ 100% FREE: This game is free to download and play.


If you love trivia and love BTS, then this is the perfect app for you. You can even use it offline when you don’t have an internet connection, as the app works offline too.

How well do you know your favorite BTS member?!

BTS Members name:
★  V
★  JUNGKOOK
★  SUGA
★  J-HOPE
★  JIN
★  JIMIN
★  RM


Disclaimer:-
★ All images are copyright of their respective owners. If we have violated any copyright by use of any images included in this game, please get in touch with us at admin@techiurus.com and we shall promptly remove it.
★ Feel free to contact us if you have any new questions that can provide to this app. Please get in touch with us at admin@techiurus.com.

The most popular kpop group South Korea. Bangtan Boys or BTS - guys who are gaining world fame. RM (Rap Monster), JungKook, Jin, Jimin, Suga, J-Hope and V (Kim Tae Hyung). You have to name the date of the debut of BTS, as well as to know some personal information about each idol from the group of Bangtan group.
With each update, new tasks. Stay with us. And also leave feedbacks they are important to us

title: Nhanh Như Chớp - Game Show Mini
description:
Nhanh Như Chớp câu đố dễ mà khó, khó mà dễ sẽ đem lại cho bạn những trận cười thả ga sau những giờ làm việc và học tập căng thẳng.

Bạn thường đi đố vui hại não bạn bè, hãy chơi game Nhanh Như Chớp để chơi khăm bạn bè nhiều hơn cùng với kho câu hỏi ngu hại não khổng lồ không bao giờ cạn kiệt. Những gói câu hỏi của Game Nhanh Nhu Chop Nhi sẽ liên tục được cập nhật qua những ý kiến đóng góp của người chơi. 

Nhanh Nhu Chop Tieng Viet là nơi rèn luyện cho bạn tinh thần thép cực kỳ hữu dụng. Cùng hoi dap hàng nghìn câu hỏi ngu hại não, hoi khon nhưng cực ngu. Tưởng dễ mà khó, tưởng hoi ngu mà hỏi ngu thật. 

Trả lời những câu hỏi ngu, hoi khon vô cùng xoắn nao của game hoi ngu để thử xem khả năng troll của mình đến đâu.
Là game vui thuộc thể loại đố vui hại não mang tính chất hai huoc game hoi ngu sẽ giúp bạn có khoảng thời gian vui vẻ và cả stress cực kỳ hiệu quả

Tính năng game hoi ngu :
- Đố vui hại não: Hàng trăm câu đố vui hại não , hoi khon, troll và vô cùng nguy hiểm đang chờ bạn khám phá.
- Tạo câu đố: Bạn là thánh troll? Hãy thách thức câu hỏi hại não tới tất cả mọi người nhé!

Hỏi Ngu Nhanh Như Chớp là một game vui thú vị, hấp dẫn bao gồm những câu đố hỏi ngu, hoi khon và hại não hay nhất mọi thời đại.

title: What Character Quiz
description:
There are too many superheroes and villains. What's the character we are looking for? 

You need to find who is he, she or it, look at the picture and solve it. 


*** INSTANT FUN *** 

No registration or no complicated rules. Just install and start playing and have fun! 


*** CAN YOU FIND ALL CHARACTERS ? *** 

Can you find all characters and unlock all levels? Countless characters from easy to tricky are waiting for you! 

*** SIMPLE BUT VERY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY *** 

What is the word you need to find? Look at the picture, find out what they are and write them. If you need help, get hint, reveal letters or remove letters. Find them all and win !

title: Trivia Live Answers - KAYA - LOCO, BAAZI NOW, HQ
description:
Answering 90% Answers Correctly 

Introducing KAYA, A personalised AI developed just to find trivia answers.

Developed by our constantly hard working team, Kaya is all you need for your trivia apps.

KAYA works from her own server, minimising the resources use on your phone. 

Just Start the suggestions and bang you are good to go!
KAYA can sometimes be annoying if you are not playing a game and she is giving you the answers. So, please turn off the suggestions As soon as your game ends to avoid this.

KAYA gives answer to 90% of the questions correctly. But, If you know the answer please go with your Knowledge as the Human Brain is much more capable of gaining Knowledge,

KAYA has some bugs here and there but worry not, they will be fixed ASAP!

* Trivia Live Answers App
* Trivia Live Answers for LOCO
* Trivia Live Answers for BAAZI NOW

Have fun Winning some prizes in these games!!!!!!
